scripts.postinstall: concurrently -n client,server "npm run install:client" "npm run install:server"
scripts.lint: concurrently -n client,server "npm run lint:client" "npm run lint:server"
scripts.build: concurrently -n client,server "npm run build:client" "npm run build:server"
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others -n client,server "npm run start:client" "npm run start:server"
scripts.setup: concurrently -n client,server "npm run setup:client" "npm run setup:server"
scripts.util:changelog:commit: git commit CHANGELOG.md CHANGELOG-current.md -m "Update changelog" || true
scripts.preversion: npm run util:dirtycheck && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.version: npm run util:changelog:generate && npm run util:changelog:generate:current && npm run util:changelog:commit && npm run util:version:reversion && npm run push
